channel.title: Comments on: Move Along, Nothing to See

item.title: By: aggrome
item.dc:creator: aggrome
item.description:
Krones is on the money, for me at least. Too busy grinding. I'm trying to keep up with everyone in my main guild and I started a guild with people from my forums on the PvP server. I'm writing this while waiting for a teleportation spire to activate.
The launch had server problems the first day, which was understandable. But problems on day two are not understandable. I'll write a more detailed report this weekend. This week's posts were pre-written.
item.content:encoded:
Krones is on the money, for me at least. Too busy grinding. I’m trying to keep up with everyone in my main guild and I started a guild with people from my forums on the PvP server. I’m writing this while waiting for a teleportation spire to activate.

The launch had server problems the first day, which was understandable. But problems on day two are not understandable. I’ll write a more detailed report this weekend. This week’s posts were pre-written.

item.title: By: Krones
item.dc:creator: Krones
item.description: I was also surprised, I suppose all the pontificators are too busy leveling up. I have been enjoying reading <a href="http://www.cesspit.net"/ rel="nofollow">Hrose's initial impressions,</a> some good critiques.
item.content:encoded: I was also surprised, I suppose all the pontificators are too busy leveling up. I have been enjoying reading Hrose’s initial impressions, some good critiques.

item.title: By: Ken Sykora
item.dc:creator: Ken Sykora
item.description: I think if you're really looking for some info on EQ2 would be to keep up-to-date on the high end raid guilds in the game. I know back in the EQ1 days FoH (http://www.fohguild.org)/ news page and forums always made for good reading. Of course now FoH is in WoW and Furor works for Blizzard. (funny how those things work out!) Find the top raid guild websites, and there's your goldmine right there.
item.content:encoded: I think if you’re really looking for some info on EQ2 would be to keep up-to-date on the high end raid guilds in the game. I know back in the EQ1 days FoH (http://www.fohguild.org/) news page and forums always made for good reading. Of course now FoH is in WoW and Furor works for Blizzard. (funny how those things work out!) Find the top raid guild websites, and there’s your goldmine right there.
